key_risks: Market volatility and liquidity risk due to small-cap stock exposure
Sensitivity to regulatory changes and economic trends
Potential scrutiny over ESG integration effectiveness and transparency
controversies: Mixed Morningstar ratings indicating variable performance
Sector concentration risk in technology and healthcare
governance_issues: ESG integration not being the primary focus of the fund
